description: A form of Haki that allows the user to create an invisible (or visible black) armor around their body. This armor can be used to augment the user's offensive and defensive capabilities, and allows them to touch and harm Logia Devil Fruit users.

keyMoments.title: Luffy's First Combat Use of Armament Haki
keyMoments.description: Luffy coats his arm in black Armament Haki and uses it to enhance his Gomu Gomu no Jet Pistol, completely destroying PX-5 in a single hit.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Luffy's Haki abilities in combat in the anime, establishing the new power level for post-timeskip One Piece.

learningSource: Trained by Silvers Rayleigh during the two-year timeskip

description: An enhanced version of Gomu Gomu no Jet Pistol that combines Gear Second's speed with Armament Haki's hardening and offensive power. The attack is so fast and powerful that it can destroy a Pacifista in a single hit.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Destroys PX-5 with Haki-Enhanced Attack
keyMoments.description: Luffy activates Gear Second and coats his arm in Armament Haki before launching a devastating Jet Pistol that completely destroys the Pacifista.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the dramatic increase in Luffy's offensive power when combining his Devil Fruit abilities with Haki.

learningSource: Combination of previous Gear Second technique with newly learned Haki

name.english: Numa Numa no Mi - Swamp Transformation
name.japanese: ヌマヌマの実 - 沼化

description: Logia transformation ability that allows Caribou to turn his body into mud/swamp, making him intangible to physical attacks. Attacks pass through his swamp body harmlessly.

keyMoments.title: Caribou Reveals Logia Intangibility
keyMoments.description: A Marine attempts to attack Caribou with a sword but the blade passes through his swamp body, revealing his Logia-type Devil Fruit powers.
keyMoments.significance: First Logia-type Devil Fruit revealed after the two-year timeskip.

learningSource: Ate the Numa Numa no Mi Devil Fruit

name.english: Numa Numa no Mi - Swamp Creation
name.japanese: ヌマヌマの実 - 沼作成
name.romanized: Numa Numa no Mi - Numa Sakusei

description: Ability to create bottomless swamps that trap and smother opponents. Those caught in the swamp sink deeper when they struggle, making escape nearly impossible.

keyMoments.title: Caribou Uses Swamp to Kill Marine
keyMoments.description: Caribou uses his swamp powers to smother and then shoot a Marine, demonstrating the lethal nature of his abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the offensive capabilities of the Numa Numa no Mi.

learningSource: Ate the Numa Numa no Mi Devil Fruit

description: Sanji's leg becomes engulfed in flames through rapid spinning or other means, dramatically increasing the power of his kicks. Post-timeskip, Sanji can activate this technique more easily.

keyMoments.title: Sanji Uses Improved Diable Jambe Against PX-7
keyMoments.description: Sanji activates Diable Jambe by spinning and uses it to help destroy Pacifista PX-7 alongside Zoro.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Sanji's improved version of Diable Jambe after the timeskip training.

learningSource: Self-developed technique improved during two-year timeskip
